content: The "Biofuels Market Expansion Act of 2011" requires manufacturers to produce a certain percentage of dual-fueled automobiles and light-duty trucks for sale in the United States. The "Biofuels Market Expansion Act of 2011" mandates the production of dual-fueled vehicles, with 50% for model years 2014 and 2015, and 90% for model year 2016 onwards.
